2023 12 Aaai

December 01, 2023

Our paper ProAgent: Building Proactive Cooperative Agents with Large Language Models has been accepted by AAAI-2024. This is a joint work with Prof. Yaodong Yang at Peking University (PKU).

Last updated: May 24, 2025
